Title: 22. Mirror Mirror: Journey Into The Mind
Description: 8th Mar-6th Jul   If you’ve ever wondered what’s the science behind what goes on in your brain, Mirror Mirror: Journey Into The Mind is the place to go. Apart from the stunning interactive installations, you’ll get to learn more about how the human mind works, exploring concepts like memories and dreams through 8 different zones.  Admission: From $22 Venue: ArtScience Museum Dates: 8th Mar-6th Jul
